SELECT u.id, u.user_id AS userId, u.coupon_id AS 'couponDO.id', u.coupon_id AS couponId, u.gmt_update AS gmtUpdate, u.gmt_create AS gmtCreate, u.gmt_end AS gmtEnd, u.gmt_start AS gmtStart, u.order_id as orderId, c.title AS 'couponDO.title', c.category_id AS 'couponDO.categoryId', y.title AS categoryTitle, c.min as 'couponDO.min', c.discount as 'couponDO.discount', u.activity_id as activityId, u.activity_type as activityType, c.type as 'couponDO.type', c.discount_type as 'couponDO.discountType' FROM kxmall_user_coupon AS u, kxmall_coupon AS c LEFT JOIN kxmall_category AS y ON c.category_id = y.id WHERE u.coupon_id = c.id AND u.user_id = #{userId} AND u.gmt_used IS NULL AND c.type =#{couponType}
AND u.order_id = 0 AND unix_timestamp(u.gmt_start) < unix_timestamp(now()) AND unix_timestamp(u.gmt_end) > unix_timestamp(now())
AND u.order_id not in (0) AND unix_timestamp(u.gmt_start) < unix_timestamp(now()) AND unix_timestamp(u.gmt_end) > unix_timestamp(now())
AND u.order_id = 0 AND (unix_timestamp(u.gmt_start) > unix_timestamp(now()) or unix_timestamp(u.gmt_end) < unix_timestamp(now()) )

SELECT u.id, u.user_id AS userId, u.coupon_id AS couponId, u.gmt_update AS gmtUpdate, u.gmt_create AS gmtCreate, c.title, c.category_id AS categoryId, y.title AS categoryTitle, c.`min`, c.discount FROM kxmall_user_coupon AS u, kxmall_coupon AS c LEFT JOIN kxmall_category AS y ON c.category_id = y.id WHERE u.id = #{userCouponId} AND u.coupon_id = c.id AND u.user_id = #{userId} AND u.gmt_used IS NULL AND unix_timestamp(u.gmt_start) < unix_timestamp(now()) AND unix_timestamp(u.gmt_end) > unix_timestamp(now())

select IFNULL(co.order_id,0) as 'orderId', IFNULL(co.gmt_used,0) as 'gmtUsed', co.gmt_start as 'gmtStart', co.gmt_end as 'gmtEnd', ifnull(us.nickname,'') as 'userDO.nickname', ifnull(us.phone,'') as 'userDO.phone', coupon.title as 'couponDO.title', coupon.type as 'couponDO.type', act.title as 'activityDO.title' from kxmall_user_coupon co left join kxmall_user us on us.id = co.user_id left join kxmall_coupon coupon on coupon.id = co.coupon_id left join kxmall_activity act on act.id = co.activity_id where 1=1
AND ( us.nickname like concat("%",#{name},"%") or us.phone like concat("%",#{name},"%"))
AND coupon.title like concat("%",#{activityName},"%")
AND act.type = #{activityType}
order by co.id desc

select count(co.id) from kxmall_user_coupon co left join kxmall_user us on us.id = co.user_id left join kxmall_coupon coupon on coupon.id = co.coupon_id left join kxmall_activity act on act.id = co.activity_id where 1=1
AND ( us.nickname like concat("%",#{name},"%") or us.phone like concat("%",#{name},"%"))
AND coupon.title like concat("%",#{activityName},"%")
AND act.type = #{activityType}
